משחק פסיכולוגי. הוא אומר שיש בעולם נפשים ונשמות. אני שמח שהיוצר גם מאמין  שיש נשמה ושאולי  לרובוט יש נשמה.

Купил игру, поиграл пока что полтора часа. Первые впечатления: игра довольно таки интересная, и самое главное что в ней надо думать, но не сильно! Отличный графон, озвучка, все это меня очень радует. Игра интересная и увлекательная, советую всем! Эта игра как раз подходит для того что бы расслабиться от современных шутеров
good game has a level editor and a good story.
Советую  хорошый сюжет как в одиночной игре так  и в сетевой можно повеселиться с другом
det er ett veldig gøy spill jeg anbefaler dette spillet

Amazing, 10/10, brilliant puzzles and great story, a great game to remember, and was even more fun when playing co-op with a friend.

До прохождения: Вроде крутая игра.
После прохождение: Любимая игра!

Ist zwar schon ziemlich alt das spiel aber trotzdem ein muss. Eines der besten Spiele überhaupt finde ich. Die Grafik sieht richtig gut aus und auch die Rätsel und Story ist sehr gut. Wer jetzt keine Lust auf Story hat sondern nur auf Rätsel kann dann auch ohne Story mit Workshop Level sehr viel Spaß haben. Warte sehnsüchtig auf einen Dritten teil der nur nie kommen wird. :(
Kocham tą grę i mapy i wszystko nawet mody

Do yourself a favour, play this game. Right now, and the first one of course. They're both dirt cheap, and they're some of the best gaming experiences you will ever have. Also, if you do decide to buy this game and the first (which you should), do not spoil yourself. Don't look up plot based spoilers, don't look up puzzle solutions, don't do any of that. This game is so, so much better without looking up anything! You're making the game worse for yourself doing that, so I highly suggest don't. 

With everything said, buy this game. You will not regret it.

I have been in love with this game since I was seven years old. I love this game and I strongly recommend it to everyone. It has a miraculous story and amazing voice actors. Words cannot express my love for this game.
It's a classic. What can i say?
i love this and so many memes!
just get it is is grate and lets hope there is a 3
Easily one of my favorite games. Gameplay is amazing. The puzzles are so fun and cool. The comedy is brilliant. Multiplayer story as well. And you can play community made levels. Incredible game.
A timeless and hilarious Valve classic that is lengthy, engaging, and has endless creative puzzles. Will be remembered as one of the greatest games of the 2010s
YES IT IS SOOOOO GOOD THX AA lot for the game
Sem dúvida um dos melhores jogos que já joguei na Steam. A história é ótima e casa muito bem com a gameplay, as mecânicas são únicas e os puzzles são muito divertidos. Recomendo a todos.
